pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'HWSD' Web Services // Programmatic interface to the Harmonized World Soil Database 'HWSD' web services (https://daac.ornl.gov/cgi-bin/dsviewer.pl?ds_id=1247). Allows for easy downloads of 'HWSD' soil data directly to your R workspace or your computer. Routines for both single pixel data downloads and gridded data are provided.
